sections.title: Detecting the current page
sections.content: Navbars and navlists will try to automatically detect and mark the current page based on the href attribute passed in. However, if you need full control, you can pass the current prop to the item directly.

sections.title: With icons
sections.content: Add a leading icons for visual context.

sections.title: With badges
sections.content: Add a trailing badge to a navbar item using the badge prop.
examples: <flux:navbar> <flux:navbar.item href="#">Home</flux:navbar.item> <flux:navbar.item href="#" badge="12">Inbox</flux:navbar.item> <flux:navbar.item href="#">Contacts</flux:navbar.item> <flux:navbar.item href="#" badge="Pro" badge:color="lime">Calendar</flux:navbar.item></flux:navbar>

sections.title: Dropdown navigation
sections.content: Condense multiple navigation items into a single dropdown menu to save on space and group related items.

sections.title: Navlist (sidebar)
sections.content: Arrange your navbar vertically using the navlist component.
examples: <flux:navlist class="w-64"> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="home">Home</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="puzzle-piece">Features</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="currency-dollar">Pricing</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="user">About</flux:navlist.item></flux:navlist>

sections.title: Collapsible groups
sections.content:
Group related navigation items into collapsible sections using the expandable prop.
If you want a group to be collapsed by default, you can use the expanded prop:
examples: <flux:navlist class="w-64"> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="home">Dashboard</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="list-bullet">Transactions</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.group heading="Account" expandable> <flux:navlist.item href="#">Profile</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#">Settings</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#">Billing</flux:navlist.item> </flux:navlist.group></flux:navlist>

sections.title: Navlist badges
sections.content: Show additional information related to a navlist item using the badge prop.
examples: <flux:navlist class="w-64"> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="home">Home</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="envelope" badge="12">Inbox</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="user-group">Contacts</flux:navlist.item> <flux:navlist.item href="#" icon="calendar-days" badge="Pro" badge:color="lime">Calendar</flux:navlist.item></flux:navlist>
